description:
When trying to upload an image using the XenServer glance plugin, receiving:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/2091/


I believe this was introduced by this patch:

https://code.launchpad.net/~rackspace-titan/nova/glance_xen_plugin_preserve_headers

What's happening is we're performing a HEAD request, getting the headers, but we're not performing a `read` on the response. This means that the `Connection` class isn't in the correct state to process the next request/response.

The solution here is to toss in a `resp.read()` after reading the headers generated by the HEAD request.
title: ResponseNotReady when uploading an image
